header.title: Introduction

section.title: Scope
section.p: The Kernel application has all the code necessary to run the Erlang runtime system: file servers, code servers, and so on.

The Kernel application is the first application started. It is mandatory in the sense that the minimal system based on Erlang/OTP consists of Kernel and STDLIB. Kernel contains the following functional areas:

list.item: Start, stop, supervision, configuration, and distribution of applications

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: It is assumed that the reader is familiar with the Erlang programming language.
